name: A 7 hours game: Fast Shoot Cowboy
name_original: A 7 hours game: Fast Shoot Cowboy
description:
This game was done as a dev test for a job application under 7 hours.

The constraints were to have a character moving in all four directions, be able to shoot enemies who shoot back and always respawn, to show the controls in the UI and to have a specific area to reload.

I decided to try for the first time doing a fast fps kind of game with an easy gameplay loop and to polish a maximum what could be done under the short time given.

Credits :
Everything but the 3D art/animations and the sounds were made by me.
The art pack is "Polygon Western - LowPoly 3D" from the Unity Asset Store.
The Sounds and the music are from Free Music Archives, and the music is "Lobo Loco - Running Eiskrokodil (ID 01) - Remastered".
The animations are from Mixamo.
